website_summaries.verdict: At less than $200 USD, the well-designed Plantronics BackBeat Sense is one of the best on-ear wireless Bluetooth headphones currently available.
pros: The Plantronics BackBeat Sense is a lightweight, comfortable on-ear wireless headphone that delivers very good sound for Bluetooth and has a strong feature set, with dual microphones and a sensor that knows when you have the headphones on or off
Battery life is good and the headphone works well as a headset for making calls
The included carrying case is nice
cons: Low-end may not be strong enough for those looking for fatter bass

customer_reviews.title: So much potential but they have a major design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Shame because this product has so much potential. Although the audio quality seemed good, the main problem I had was that the volume knob made a terrible knocking noise when my head moved the smallest bit. Especially annoying when walking. Not a manufacturing defect because I've read others complaining of the same issue. Just a design flaw which needs to be rectified for this product to be great.
customer_reviews.author: BigMike

customer_reviews.title: Very nice above-average headphones
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Really nice sound and comfortable to wear for hours. Controls are in intuitive places and the mic feature that let's you hear surroundings in your headphones so you can talk to people without taking the headphones off is one of its best features. Solid set of headphones and I'm really well-pleased with them. Cons: The auto pause/play is super sensitive and often cuts out when I'm not stationary--which forced me to disable this feature. Mic while on Bluetooth is not the best as I've had callers complain they can't hear me. When wired callers say it's much improved voice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. You need to connect them everytime you use them with whatever they are paired with. Very comfortable and light weight. For older devices, they don't like to pair with them. I think because the bluetooth version of the headphones is newer.
customer_reviews.author: techsavvykat

customer_reviews.title: I liked these, not terrible low-mid end bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: I liked these, not terrible low-mid end bluetooth headphones. Comfortable - but I did have some loud popping noises occasionally on mine, not sure if it was defective or just how it performs. I had to return as a result and opted for a higher end instead. Happy I did so far.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: A Steal!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight. Easy to connect, Great battery life. Good easy to use buttons, outstanding connection to two devices at the same time. Good mic, not great because no headphone of this kind is meant to be that, but is the best one I have used. Durability for me was about two years of very hard use. I can't stress the weight factor enough. These are the lightest on or over the ear headphones I have found. That makes all the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Enrique

customer_reviews.title: Great sound; good price
customer_reviews.text: Got these as gift for my engineer husband. He loves them....nuff said.
customer_reviews.author: farouche

customer_reviews.title: Great features and sound
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones, great sound, comfortable and have easy to use controls. I especially love the feature to skip or go back on songs that are playing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic headphones! Surprisingly amazing and so much better than ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic headphones! Surprisingly amazing and so much better than the Bose 35's I bought a few days earlier..One of best purchases I've made in a long time (and I make a lot of purchases!) Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: SamIamnot888

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Solid headphones overall. Stylish with a pretty snug fit over ear. Not really good in maximum effort situations in the gym per say but fitting for most standard uses. Wish there was a way to remove the ear cups to allow for it to be cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: T.Carrey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These started out as a great pair of headphones but now (3 months later) I have a knocking noise in the left ear which seems to be the wheel/mechanism rattling when walking. Very, very annoying and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: ... techno geek by any means but these were very easy to setup Very good ambient sound cancellation
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a techno geek by any means but these were very easy to setup Very good ambient sound cancellation
customer_reviews.author: R. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great sound ;poor Plantronics customer service
customer_reviews.text: Here is problem . These sound good; but first set had a loose control on Left headphone that had an annoying rattle every time I moved my head. since i only use them infrequently more then 30 days had gone by. Plantronics sent me replacement but refused to email me a postage paid return sticker and it will cost $12.85 for me to send back. Plantronics says if I don't return defective Headphones they will put so kind of hold on my account. This is fine as i do not plan to order from them again. Buy them for sound if you like but use daily for 30 days to be sure you don't have defect
customer_reviews.author: sheldon t

customer_reviews.title: Great BT headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headphones!! The Bluetooth auto connects to your phone and the music pauses as soon as you take them off your head and resumes when you place them back on. Great sound quality for the price and very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Mehalic

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable headphone
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable headphone with a lot of features. The sound quality is very good but not on par with the sound quality of the backbeat pro that I also have. Overall, one of my best headphone so far!
customer_reviews.author: marckster

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. I can hear music outside when my phone is in an upstairs bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: This product is superior than other big brand names
customer_reviews.text: This product is superior than other big brand names, don't let the FAMOUS brand names fool you, Plantronics did it with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Araiza

customer_reviews.title: great sound. I use them almost
customer_reviews.text: They are as advertised, great sound. I use them almost daily
customer_reviews.author: IApple

customer_reviews.title: Simply Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Very reliable bluetooth connection. Good sounding on ear headphone, excellent comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound and comfort! The only drawback is the annoying sound that comes from the headband when you move around too much. Apart from that, I highly recommend this headphone.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling.
customer_reviews.text: They sound great and very lightweight. I know it's been said before, but I wish the clamped better on your head. They look great, and the reason I bought them was for traveling and being able to pack flat to fit in my laptop bag. And that they do. Would buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, light weight , good sound with minor trade offs
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and comfortable. Sounds good. Looks good and classy. I have dark brown and black version. Sometimes the sound cracks though due to connection changes i guess. But I don't mind this occasional glitch. And I turned off the automatic play/pause based on user having/not having them on. This feature works but not consistently. Also, a bit loose on the fit, so might not work if you try to exercise or run with these on. Not a stereo sound focused device although has good quality sound. Sometimes has good soundstage based on the song.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Sounding Headphones with GREAT range
customer_reviews.text: The sound is very good. No noise cancelling, but not needed for my use. The best thing is its range. I can go anywhere in my three story house and never loose signal from my PC. I haven't used it from a phone, so I can't say the range would be as good. But for my needs it is perfect. The comfortable ear pieces and nice travel case are also a plus. Strongly recommended if you don't need noise cancelling.
customer_reviews.author: RS from Colo

customer_reviews.title: The feature of pause/play when removing the headphones from your head works mediocre at best. I have had this product for just o
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is OK. The feature of pause/play when removing the headphones from your head works mediocre at best. I have had this product for just over a year and the headset will no longer work. It will not power on or take a charge. Very disappointed in this poor product. Now I have to go buy new wireless headphones once again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor instructions. Can only sync to single device when ...
customer_reviews.text: Hassle to set up. Poor instructions. Can only sync to single device when it does work. Will not sync with samsung note 8 Returning asap I don’t recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jay H. Lara

customer_reviews.title: controls are all great!
customer_reviews.text: ear hurts a little after 2hrs but might be because I have glasses otherwise battery life, sound, controls are all great!
customer_reviews.author: Lance Park

customer_reviews.title: Horrible sound quality and the sense technology inhibit the reliability ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this product!! Horrible sound quality and the sense technology inhibit the reliability receiving music or calls. TERRIBLE!!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Warren

customer_reviews.title: Perfect on the go headphones with many features and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Happy with my purchase. The right size awesome features easy to use and great sound !
customer_reviews.author: this.juvy

customer_reviews.title: Not a very good product for iPhone 6
customer_reviews.text: Am having lot of problems with this with my iPhone 6. It works fairly well with youtube videos and music on iPhone. However, for some reason whenever I use it for phone calls, it defaults to mute and the caller cannot hear me. I thought it was broken, but after a few tries realized that pressing the on/off button, removes it from mute mode. I don't know why it behaves so strangely!
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd "Three Eyes"

customer_reviews.title: No BASE at all.
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality Bluetooth headphone experience, with a "NO BASE" at all tinny sound. A $5 wireless headset sounds better.
customer_reviews.author: dbh

customer_reviews.title: Recommend them
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sound and lightweight. The features (referring specifically to its solid bluetooth connectivity and automatic pause) put these babies over the top. I've only had them about a month so I can't comment on their longevity but I expect them to last me awhile. I'd recommend these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Asa

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is amazing, especially for the price. I have an in-ear headdset for listening to podcasts and NPR. Those are great for the gym bag. But I wanted something inexpensive for music listening. These fit that role perfectly. The sound is crisp. If you want something that over-does the bass, there are better options. But these provide the nice, balanced sound quality I wanted at a price I was willing to pay.
customer_reviews.author: JDM

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the Plantronics Bluetooth headphones. They connect quickly to my devices, are lightweight and very comfortable to wear, and deliver excellent sound and voice quality. I received them in very attractive packaging, much nicer than one would expect . They fell and operate like a quality device. One of the best purchases I've made on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: This is a shame as they are beautiful, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: As others mentioned loud clanking noise when moving around due to self adjusting design. This is a shame as they are beautiful, very comfortable, and did sound good to me. Had to return as I primarily use headphones when moving / walking.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Cox

customer_reviews.title: ... movements made while wearing these headphones lead to an annoying thumping sound
customer_reviews.text: As many reviews have echoed---as any movements made while wearing these headphones lead to an annoying thumping sound. You most be sitting down and/or be stationary to avoid the thumping sound. The passive noise canceling leaves much to be desired. Overall, I wasn't terribly pleased with the headphones, I would suggest looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Adesayo Akinsanya

customer_reviews.title: ... now for about six months and it is the best headset I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I have had this headset now for about six months and it is the best headset I have ever owned. it is very lightweight and definitely cuts out any outside noise. the sound is crystal clear and it syncs with my iPhone perfectly. The sound it has given me is stereo perfect and the battery life is completely amazing. it last 5 to 6 days on one charge.
customer_reviews.author: Easydusit57

customer_reviews.title: These are really really good headphones with one caveat
customer_reviews.text: These are really really good headphones with one caveat. They are not loud enough. Just a little bit more volume would make these excellent headphones. Easy to pair and use. SUPER fast pairing. Great distances from bluetooth transmitting devices.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory A. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Light-weight, good battery life, robust blue tooth connection, good volume control. Sometimes re-activating them will prompt a native player application (r.e. spotify app) to resume unexpectedly, but that's not too annoying and sometimes it's actually quite convenient.
customer_reviews.author: James Riley

customer_reviews.title: They arrived in great condition and on time
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. The recipient loves them. They arrived in great condition and on time.
customer_reviews.author: M. Watt

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. I've tried many wireless headphones, more expensive ones, and these are by far the best!!
customer_reviews.author: dmgalley

customer_reviews.title: Love these on-ear headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones! Light and great for on the go or anytime. Great bass for such a lightweight headphones!
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied in every way. I listen only to classical music. (Written after 1840? Probably just noise!) 😁 plop my Planatronics on my head, phone in pocket, and I'm all set for hours. Excellent sound, comfortable for hours, practical features.I recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Using it every day with my Apple TV 4.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitry

customer_reviews.title: Very good headphone
customer_reviews.text: I am using the headphone for more than a year with no issues. Only note that there is a sound delay.
customer_reviews.author: sis1111

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Awesome headphones. Here's why: +Lightweight, forget you have them on. +Comfortable, see above. +Sound is awesome. Very flat and not boomy in the bass. +Controls are great. +Battery life is 30+ hrs. +Bluetooth works flawlessly. +On/Off when removed works awesome. -Isolation is not that good but decent. -A little pricey for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Leguizamo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and easy to set up & use. Good battery life too.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bailey

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best head phones I ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best head phones I ever used. For the price and functionality it is well worth the price
customer_reviews.author: sjjones

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones - beautiful sound, nice design, comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Tague

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, nice fit, comfortable, but lacks one important detail.
customer_reviews.text: Happy with these, my only complaint is that they don't automatically pair with my BT transmitter. I know this isn't my transmitter's fault since other devices always automatically pair even if they've been turned off for a while. Since these babies run off firmware hopefully there will be an update from Plantronics one day that allows them to automatically pair. I'm not holding my breath though.
customer_reviews.author: Undermeadow

customer_reviews.title: Superb headphones at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these headphones daily for about a month. I love them. The sound quality is excellent and balanced. They are very comfortable and light. I use them mainly on the train, and they easily generate enough volume. They are just very well designed and put together so everything just works easily and well. Excellent headset for phone calls too. For the money, I don't know how you could do better.
customer_reviews.author: David Angel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, great batter life, easy to wear! love them!
customer_reviews.author: Frane

customer_reviews.title: Near perfect wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: Finest sounding wireless headphones available. Easy to connect, good controls and comfortable to wear. I love these and highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E. Blumer

customer_reviews.title: This is really comfortable, has convenient features (like pause when you take ...
customer_reviews.text: This is really comfortable, has convenient features (like pause when you take off the headphone, resume when you wear it), and good Bluetooth connection. No complaints at all! I loved it so much I bought another one for a gift to my niece.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: they are light-weight and the sound is excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for a 21 year old. He loves them, they are light-weight and the sound is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Dana C. Christian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately I had to return it because It does not connect to computers
customer_reviews.author: cary salcedo

customer_reviews.title: Best budget headphones
customer_reviews.text: For this price range, this is a great pair of headphones. Sound quality is great and balanced, not heavily relying on bass to make it sound "richer" (you can always tweak that in your audio settings). I've had mine for 2 years (close to 3 now) and they're holding up very well. No wear on the ear muffs like many other brands I've tried (looking at you Coloud). They are a little loose so heavy head movement will probably cause them to drop off your head but for casual listeners or those on the go, it's perfect. Otherwise, they are incredibly comfortable and you can wear them for extended periods of time before the eventual headphone-headache sets in.
customer_reviews.author: Gianne

product_meta.title: Plantronics 202649-01 Backbeat Sense Stereo Bluetooth Wireless Headphones - Black/Espresso
